metadata.synopsis: Party Banter for Laezel and SH in Last Light (cursed)

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: Last Light's defenders - slaughtered, every last one.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: They were arrogant enough to try and withstand Lady Shar's power. This was always going to be the end result.
1.context: NodeContext: 'They didn't deserve this' = SH turned from Shar. 'They were arrogant' = SH loyal to Shar
